entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-14
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • .NET CLI - If a runtime ID is passed through OS flag, a non-descriptive error message is returned #23433
    Backlog

Updated

  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • rc2 tagged sdk cross build for ppc64le fails #36062
  • [NET 8.0 - RC2] Warning: Failed to read or parse localization file "C:\Program Files\.....\microsoft.dotnet.web.projecttemplates.8.0.8.0.0-rc.2.23480.2.nupkg ......... #36000
  • dotnet tool restore --interactive hangs forever #24220
    9.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Skip workload integrity check on Linux and non-sudo #36123
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Updated

  • Enable users to install unlisted version of tool if specify the exact match of the version of the tool #36021
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • When transforming web.config check if target framework is .NET Framework. #34618
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36078
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
